pages.text: The next step after steel is $(thing)black steel$(). Luckily, we don't need to build anything new for this. We just need to follow an alloy recipe in a crucible to make weak steel. Make sure to use a bellows!$(br2)$(item)Weak Steel$()$(br2)$(thing)Steel:$() 50-70%$(br)$(thing)Nickel$(): 15-25%$(br)$(thing)Black Bronze$(): 15-25%
Alloy reference:$(br2)$(item)Black Bronze:$()$(2br)$(thing)Copper:$() 50-70%$(br)$(thing)Silver:$() 10-25%$(br)$(thing)Gold:$() 10-25%$(br2)$(br2)$(thing)Note: Nickel is Garnierite$()
Weld a $(item)weak steel ingot$() and $(item)pig iron$() to produce a $(thing)High Carbon Black Steel Ingot$().
Work that ingot to produce a $(thing)Black Steel Ingot.
